entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wasm test failure: Unable to evaluate script: target frame detached #102957
  • Wasm test failure: System addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open #102955

Closed

  • Perf_Single/Double.TryParse regressions #102865
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder writes incorrect type names to generated assembly for nested types #102777
    9.0.0
  • Reevaluate HW intrinsic immediate const parameters after method containing HW intrinsics is inlined #11138
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] Avoid method call to fallback intrinsic method if immediate arg becomes constant #9989
    Future
  • Strange JMP over NOP in try-catch-finally #102013
  • RyuJIT generates unnecessary null check #4324
    Future
  • .dbg in ilcompiler package #102684
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Low-level runtime shutdown event for critical cleanup #62834
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: custom "Ignore" conditions on properties #102945
  • [API Proposal]: Employ `allows ref struct` in libraries #102671
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • need to account for unsuccessful commit case when hardlimit isn't on #102961
    area-GC-coreclr
  • HttpIOException when establishing connection, unobserved task exception #102960
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Better createdump error message for single-file apps for heap or triage dump types. #102959
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • WIP: Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #102956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding a default IEnumerable.GetEnumerator implementation to IEnumerable<T> #102954
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix build on alpine arm64 #102953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add retry loop around Process.Kill(entireProcessTree: true) #102958
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix regression in Number.NumberBuffer.cs #102950
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix bug in referencing nested type in IL #102933
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Allow shuffle and other hwintrinsic that require a constant to stay intrinsic if the operand becomes constant later #102827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove debug symbols from non-symbols ilc package #102803
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete VectorT size constants from minipal/cpufeatures #102946
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Baseline failing pri-1 JIT tests #102944
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `where T : allows ref struct` in runtime #102795
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: GetActiveElementCount #102813
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2464916 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • ILCompiler.pkgproj: remove 'runtime.json' when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #102908
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • refactor: rename COMPlus classes to make a clear distinction with COM interop #102922
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add gcinfodumper implementation. #102920
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • Experiment - Remove space restriction from XarchIntrinsicConstants #102913
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host
  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrating EsrpCodeSigning Task From Version 4 to Version 5 #102948
    area-Infrastructure
